comments.author: cjones.bugs@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
Bug 690469 landed a very bad regression that should have been caught by leak checking, however we only run reftest-ipc/crashtest-ipc in opt builds.

This bug covers the work needed to get the tests passing.
